homePage.HeaderTitle: Organize your tasks and boost your daily productivity with Ticktack
homePage.HeaderDesc: Stay focused on your goals and track your tasks efficiently and clearly.
homePage.About: Take control of your daily schedule effectively, prioritize your tasks, and monitor your progress. Whatever the nature of your work, you will find all your tasks organized in a way that provides clarity and greater focus.
homePage.feat1: Efficient Task Management: Add, edit, or delete tasks easily.
homePage.feat2: Precise Reminders: Never miss an important appointment or task.
homePage.feat3: Priority Sorting: Identify the most important tasks and focus on them first.
homePage.feat4: Smooth and Professional Interface: A comfortable design that makes tracking details easy.
homePage.feat5: Compatible with All Devices: Whether on desktop or mobile.
homePage.step2: Add your daily or weekly tasks.
homePage.step4: Complete your tasks efficiently and achieve your goals easily.
homePage.secEnd: Achievement starts with a single step, and every completed task brings you closer to your goal.

tasks.AddNewTask: + Add new task. Press enter to save.
tasks.dbClick: Double click the text to edit or remove
